1.title: TechStart Solutions
1.description: Modern corporate website with advanced animations and CMS integration
1.fullDescription: A comprehensive digital transformation project for TechStart Solutions, featuring a modern corporate website with advanced animations, seamless CMS integration, and optimized performance. The project included complete brand alignment, user experience optimization, and conversion rate improvements.

2.title: ShopFlow E-commerce
2.description: Complete e-commerce platform with payment integration and inventory management
2.fullDescription: A full-scale e-commerce solution built for ShopFlow, featuring advanced payment processing, real-time inventory management, and comprehensive analytics. The platform handles high-volume transactions with seamless user experience and robust security measures.

3.title: FitTracker Mobile
3.description: Cross-platform fitness tracking app with real-time analytics
3.fullDescription: A comprehensive fitness tracking mobile application that provides real-time analytics, personalized workout plans, and social features. Built with React Native for cross-platform compatibility and integrated with wearable devices for seamless health monitoring.

4.title: Creative Studio Brand
4.description: Complete brand identity design with logo, guidelines, and marketing materials
4.fullDescription: A comprehensive brand identity project for Creative Studio, including logo design, brand guidelines, marketing materials, and digital assets. The project focused on creating a cohesive visual identity that reflects the studio's creative excellence and professional approach.

5.title: DataViz Dashboard
5.description: Interactive data visualization dashboard for business analytics
5.fullDescription: An advanced business intelligence dashboard featuring interactive data visualizations, real-time analytics, and comprehensive reporting tools. Built to handle large datasets with optimized performance and intuitive user interface for data-driven decision making.

6.title: RestaurantPro POS
6.description: Point of sale system for restaurants with inventory and staff management
6.fullDescription: A comprehensive point-of-sale system designed specifically for restaurants, featuring order management, inventory tracking, staff scheduling, and customer relationship management. The system integrates with kitchen displays and payment processors for seamless operations.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: We are a passionate team of designers and developers dedicated to creating digital experiences that inspire and drive results.
aboutPage.description1: GOROSEI specializes in comprehensive digital solutions - from building websites and apps from scratch to maintaining and migrating existing platforms to modern systems.
aboutPage.description2: We use modern methodologies like Agile, Scrum, and Design Thinking, combined with cutting-edge tools including IntelliJ, VS Code, Figma, Postman, Jira, Docker, and Kubernetes.
aboutPage.description3: Every project includes documented source code, interactive prototypes, complete technical documentation, and regular progress reports. We focus on user-friendly design and optimal performance.
aboutPage.valuesDescription: These core principles guide everything we do and shape how we work with our clients and each other.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace cutting-edge technologies and creative solutions to deliver exceptional results.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work closely with our clients to understand their vision and bring it to life.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, ensuring the highest quality standards.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We love what we do and it shows in every pixel, every line of code, every design.

aboutPage.galleryDescription: Take a glimpse into our creative workspace, team culture, and the passion that drives our work every day.
aboutPage.workDescription: Let's create something amazing together. Get in touch and let's discuss how we can bring your vision to life.

project-timeline.question: How long does project development take?
project-timeline.answer: Website development generally takes up to 1 month, calculated after all materials are complete (logo, content, images). For simple projects with complete materials, it can be faster. Custom projects with complex revisions will be adjusted accordingly.

payment-methods.question: What payment methods are available?
payment-methods.answer: Payment can be made via QRIS or Bank Transfer under GOROSEI name. We do not accept payments through personal accounts, e-wallets, or credit cards to maintain transaction security.

custom-project.question: Can you handle custom projects?
custom-project.answer: Absolutely. We handle various custom needs such as booking systems, third-party API integrations, unique features, or custom designs. Please share your requirements, and we'll calculate cost and time estimates based on project complexity.

how-to-order.question: How to order GOROSEI services?
how-to-order.answer: You can order services through: (1) Fill out the form on the Contact page, (2) Click 'Get Started' button on Homepage or Pricing page, (3) Contact us for free consultation without commitment.

revision-policy.question: How many revisions are allowed?
revision-policy.answer: We provide 2-3 major revisions for UI/UX design and system architecture. Minor revisions like color adjustments or small fixes are still served within scope. Major changes like total redesign will be evaluated as change requests with additional costs.

feature-changes.question: What's the mechanism for feature changes during the project?
feature-changes.answer: Feature changes can be communicated anytime to our System Analyst. Process: (1) Internal impact analysis, (2) Time & cost estimation, (3) Client approval, (4) Implementation. Changes within initial scope are free, new feature additions are calculated as additional modules.

quality-guarantee.question: What quality assurance and service guarantee do you provide?
quality-guarantee.answer: We provide 30-90 days warranty after release for bug fixing, logic errors, design inconsistencies, and basic performance. Every deliverable goes through complete QA Testing: functional testing, UI/UX validation, API testing, and load testing. System is ensured stable before handover.

post-production.question: How do post-production and maintenance services work?
post-production.answer: We provide maintenance packages including bug fixing, updates, security, performance monitoring, and regular backups. Support through chat, email, or help tickets. If unsatisfied: (1) Full 3-month support + 3x major revisions, or (2) 50% refund + website live for 1 year.

revision-guarantee.question: Is there a revision guarantee?
revision-guarantee.answer: Yes, every project gets 3 free revisions as long as it's within the agreed initial scope. Adjustments in the initial version can be requested without additional costs.

portfolio-access.question: Where can I see GOROSEI's portfolio?
portfolio-access.answer: Since many clients request project privacy, we don't display public portfolios. However, if you need references, contact us to see project examples (with anonymized data) so you can assess our work quality.

consultation-process.question: How does the initial consultation process work?
consultation-process.answer: Click the 'Free Consultation' button and fill out a brief form. We'll contact you via email or WhatsApp to schedule a discussion session at a time convenient for you.

footer.description: Comprehensive digital solutions for websites, applications, and platform migration using modern technology.
